RE_BigJar.Name: strange jar
RE_BigJar.Desc: Transforms an item into a better item. (Potion -> Key -> Artifact -> Active Item -> Unique Equipment)
RE_BigJar.EventDetails:
A strange pot with an invisible inside.
I think I can put something in there.
(Potion -> Key -> Relic -> Active Item -> <color=#F53172FF>Unique Equipment</color>)
OrderStrings: I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_BlackSmith.Name: shabby forge
RE_BlackSmith.Desc: Smelt equipment, relics, and active items to transform them into other items of the same type.
RE_BlackSmith.EventDetails:
It's a forge that's all crumbling down.
The anvil and hammer are rusty, but it looks like they can still be used.
OrderStrings:
The anvil and hammer that ran out of durability were broken.
I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_Midas.Name: golden statue of miders
RE_Midas.Desc: Convert items to gold up to 1500 gold.
RE_Midas.EventDetails:
The golden statue is shining brilliantly.
Residual Conversion Amount: Forward &aGold

RE_BloodKey.Name: blood bank
RE_BloodKey.Desc: You can get a Key by sacrificing 20 Health. You can obtain up to 2 keys.
UseButtonTooltip: Choose an ally and sacrifice 10 HP.
RE_BloodKey.EventDetails:
A bank that stores blood.
If you donate more stamina to &a, you will be able to get the key.
OrderStrings: Your blood bag is full and you can no longer donate blood.

RE_KeyGarden.Name: garden of keys
RE_KeyGarden.Desc: All allies take a small amount of damage. After that, choose one of the following and acquire it. (1 key, or 1 skill book + 200 gold)
UseButtonTooltip: Deal 6 damage to all allies, gain a key
Deal 6 damage to all allies, get 1 skill book and 200 gold
RE_KeyGarden.EventDetails:
It is a garden that has not yet been eroded by the Black Mist.
The inside of the garden seems to have a complex structure like a maze.
OrderStrings:
I found the key deep inside the garden.
However, it suffered a small amount of damage from the black mist that followed.

I found a skillbook and gold in a treasure chest near the garden.
However, it suffered a small amount of damage from the black mist that followed.

RE_Medicaltent.Name: medical tent
RE_Medicaltent.Desc: You can choose one of the following: (Reviving allies who are unable to fight / Recovers 100% of HP of 1 ally / Recovers 50% of HP of all allies)
UseButtonTooltip: Heals one ally's moribund state.
Recovers all HP of one ally.
Recovers half of all allies' HP.
RE_Medicaltent.EventDetails:
Abandoned medical facility.
The equipment is very old, but it looks like it can still be used.
OrderStrings: There seems to be nothing more that can be done here.

RE_GoldenOven.Name: golden oven
RE_GoldenOven.Desc: Obtain 2 Bread or consume 3 Bread to obtain 'Golden Bread' 1 piece.
UseButton: Use 3 breads to make golden bread
UseButtonTooltip: Get 2 Breads
Consume 3 Bread to get 1 Golden Bread
RE_GoldenOven.EventDetails:
The golden oven is shining brilliantly.
You can bake delicious bread here.
OrderStrings:
The oven light went out.
I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_SwordSanctuary.Name: Sanctuary of the Sword
RE_SwordSanctuary.Desc: Instead of acquiring 'Sword of the Forest', the boss of this stage is changed to 'Sir Dortsch'.
UseButtonTooltip: Acquire the 'Forest Sword'. The boss of this stage is changed.
RE_SwordSanctuary.EventDetails:
A sword that shines softly is stuck in the hard rock.
A slab near the sword reads:
“In honor of the heroes of the Dochis who were more valiant than anyone else”
OrderStrings:
As I pulled out my sword, I heard a rustling sound from somewhere.
Is it because of the feeling? It feels like someone is watching.
There is nothing left in the place where the sword was...

RE_FountainOblivion.Name: fountain of wishes
RE_FountainOblivion.EventDetails: It is a magical fountain that is said to make wishes come true. As I get closer, Sam's will speaks to me. “You still don’t have enough vessels to fulfill your wish. Right now, I can only grant very weak wishes." (Enter 'Blood Park' and prove your strength)
OrderStrings: You lose Lucy's skill 'Acceleration', and you gain it by selecting one of 4 other Lucy's rare skills.
You lose Lucy's skill 'Acceleration', and you get one infinite skill book and one Celestial.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost, and it is obtained by selecting 1 out of 4 relics.
Skill Book - Get 1 Healing Stone.
Get 1 key.
Lucy loses 'Acceleration' and gains 1 golden apple.
Lucy's skill 'Acceleration' is lost, and it is obtained by selecting 1 of 3 active items.

When the wish is realized, the light disappears from the fountain that has fulfilled its role.
The voice is no longer heard.

It is a magical fountain that is said to make wishes come true.
As I get closer, Sam's will speaks to me.

"You are well-deserved to make wishes come true.
But remember. The stronger the wish, the higher the price..."

RE_AlchemistHouse.Name: The Alchemist's House
RE_AlchemistHouse.Desc: Obtain 1 Random Potion. You can use the key to additionally obtain 1 random potion and Advanced grade equipment.
UseButtonTooltip: Get 1 random potion
RE_AlchemistHouse.EventDetails:
A house that smells of medicinal herbs where an alchemist lived.
It seems to have been left unattended now.
OrderStrings:
The search was successfully completed.
It looks like you got everything you could get here.

I found a potion that looked useful in a dusty place.
If you open the basement door, you can explore even deeper...
go down to the basement
Use the key to get 1 random potion and 1 <color=#A3C52FFF>Advanced Grade</color> equipment item

RE_EnchantingTable.Name: enchantment table
RE_EnchantingTable.Desc: Gives random positive enchantments to equipment items. It can be used up to 2 times.
RE_EnchantingTable.EventDetails:
You can grant beneficial enchantments to equipment items.
You can use &a more times.
OrderStrings:
Unable to withstand the overheating of magic power, the table broke.
I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_SacrificeSkill.Name: sacrifice of knowledge
RE_SacrificeSkill.Desc: Select and sacrifice 1 exclusive skill of an ally, and enhance 1 skill.
RE_SacrificeSkill.EventDetails:
A huge book is floating in chains.
The title on the cover of the book is, “The Sacrifice of Knowledge”.
As we got closer, the book began to move slowly, as if it wanted something.
OrderStrings:
The greedy book is still hungry.
You have to sacrifice 1 more skill.

The book begins to unfold, shining brightly as if satisfied.
A mysterious power is felt from the book.
strengthen skills
Sacrifice skill once again
After completing the role, the book returned to its original form.
Choose a skill to sacrifice

RE_TrialofTime.Name: the ordeal of time
RE_TrialofTime.Desc: During the boss battle of this stage, Time limit is applied. If you clear within the specified time, you will receive an additional reward.
UseButtonTooltip: 20% less time limit compared to normal trials
RE_TrialofTime.EventDetails:
The clock emblem, which symbolizes time, shines flexibly.
Let's prove our competence by facing trials.
OrderStrings:
The ordeal of time has begun.
Let's prepare thoroughly and take on the ordeal.

RE_Gardencemetery.Name: garden cemetery
RE_Gardencemetery.Desc: Acquire 1 Cursed Advanced GradeEquipment Item, or Lucy's Curse Skill and Gold > is obtained.
UseButton: Digging the grave of a chaebol
UseButtonTooltip: Acquire 1 Cursed <color=#A3C52FFF>Advanced Grade</color> Equipment
Get Lucy Curse skill and get gold
RE_Gardencemetery.EventDetails:
It is an abandoned cemetery with little maintenance.
It seems that something is buried inside the two large tombs.
OrderStrings:
When the tomb was dug, stolen goods appeared with an ominous energy.
I can hear the grim screams of the ghosts...

RE_Invertedcross.Name: inverted cross ornament
RE_Invertedcross.Desc: Applies random negative enchantment to equipment items, and acquires 1 skill book and 200 gold.
UseButtonTooltip: After applying negative enchantment to 1 piece of equipment, obtain 1 skill book and 200 gold
RE_Invertedcross.EventDetails:
Blood drips from the sinister topiary in the shape of an inverted cross.
I think I can put something on the altar.
OrderStrings:
The blood that had fallen from the inverted cross seeped into the equipment.
I think this equipment should be handled with care...

RE_MaidsHouse.Name: maid's house
RE_MaidsHouse.Desc: Battle with elite monsters. When you win, you receive a special reward. (Fixed reward: skill book - the essence of healing)
RE_MaidsHouse.EventDetails:
This is where the maid dolls live.
Maid dolls are bustling around the house.
OrderStrings:
The maids who lost their heads started to scatter in confusion.
You obtained a reward that looks useful in an empty dorm.

RE_TrialofWisdom.Name: Trial of Wisdom
RE_TrialofWisdom.Desc: I use my deck to test.
RE_TrialofWisdom.EventDetails: A voice is heard from the gravestone. "I will create a deck with the skills of comrades and randomly select 6 skills. The 6 skills can pass trials if they meet the conditions you selected. "
OrderStrings: the sum of the costs is 10 or more
1 or more skills that cost 3 or more
2 or more skills that inflict the Pain debuff
2 or more skills that inflict Weakness and Interference debuffs
2 or more skills that grant buffs
3 or more healing skills
no basic skills

RE_EnforceSkill.Name: reinforced cube
RE_EnforceSkill.Desc: Strengthen 1 ally's skill. However, you must weak another skill with a 50% chance.
UseButton: stand in front of the altar
RE_EnforceSkill.EventDetails:
An unknown device that looks like a cube floats with brilliant colors.
A mysterious energy is felt near the altar.
OrderStrings: touch the statue
The cube began to vibrate with a slight mechanical sound.

It seems that the power of the cube has permeated the skill.
A cube that has finished functioning doesn't seem to work anymore.

RE_EnforceCrystal.Name: witch's vault
RE_EnforceCrystal.Desc: Select an ally's skill and enhance it. Reinforced ally's Max HP is reduced by 4.
UseButtonTooltip: Enhances one ally's skill, reduces MAX HP by 4
RE_EnforceCrystal.EventDetails:
A witch's safe with an ominous power.
A powerful force is felt from within.
OrderStrings:
As the skill was strengthened, an unidentified smoke suddenly flowed out from the inside of the safe.
I hurriedly shut my mouth, but it seems it's too late...
I saw something terrible that shouldn't have been seen in the safe...
Reduces the master's max HP by 4
Acquire Lucy Curse Skill
Please select a skill, and the option to enhance the corresponding skill will appear. (When strengthening, the selected character's maximum HP is -4)
Max Health -4

RE_Library.Name: library
RE_Library.Desc: Acquire 1 Skill Book. Also, you can obtain an additional Infinite Skill Book by using Key.
RE_Library.EventDetails:
It is a treasure trove of knowledge that has been preserved from general books to forbidden books.
Books can be borrowed freely.
OrderStrings: Use the key to open the door.

Through the tightly lined bookshelves, the door leading down to the basement library came into view.
There may be rare books that are not found on earth.

I was able to obtain a useful book from the basement library.
Be sure to return the borrowed book to its original place later..

RE_PotionCafe.Name: potion cafe
RE_PotionCafe.EventDetails:
It is a potion cafe where various scents are gathered and harmonized.
It seems that several potions are left unattended on the shelves.
OrderStrings:
After taking some potions that looked useful, the shelves quickly ran out.
There doesn't seem to be any more to see.

RE_KeyVending.Name: key merchant
RE_KeyVending.Desc: You can pay 400 gold to buy 1 key. You can use it up to 2 times.
RE_KeyVending.EventDetails:
A scarecrow merchant is selling keys.
Here, it seems that you can purchase it at a cheaper price than in a normal store.

(Remaining key stock: &a)
OrderStrings:
A scarecrow that has filled its sales quota shakes its body happily.
It doesn't seem to be available for purchase anymore.

RE_LucyCurseRemover.Name: fountain of purification
RE_LucyCurseRemover.Desc: Remove all the curses and Lucy's curse skills. If you succeed in removing even one, you get 200 gold.
UseButtonTooltip: Removes all Curse and Lucy Curse skills from all equipment
RE_LucyCurseRemover.EventDetails:
A sacred fountain that can wash away liquids.
I think I can get all the bad energy out of here.
OrderStrings:
When I put my hand in the running water, the curse's energy disappeared like snow.
The fountain ran out of water. I don't think it can be used anymore.

RE_TrialofStrength.Name: trial of strength
RE_TrialofStrength.Desc:
Pay 500 gold and try the ordeal.
The higher the damage, the better the rewards.
RE_TrialofStrength.EventDetails:
The sword's crest, which symbolizes power, is shining sharply.
Let's prove our competence by facing trials.

(List of rewards according to the amount of damage dealt)
OrderStrings:
The trial of strength has ended.
He obtained a reward commensurate with the strength he showed from the ordeal.

RE_abandonedwarehouse.Name: abandoned warehouse
RE_abandonedwarehouse.Desc: Acquire 3 'Scrap Steel' that can be used in crafting. In addition, by using a key or receiving a curse, 2 'Useful Scrap' of Advanced Grade are acquired.
UseButtonTooltip: Get 3 Scrap
RE_abandonedwarehouse.EventDetails:
Abandoned warehouse that smells like rusted iron.
A lot of waste is mixed up and left unattended.
OrderStrings:
I found some scrap metal that I thought could be used, and put it in my bag.
There is still a locked iron door inside the warehouse.
open the door with the key

Inside the door, there are scrap metals in slightly better condition.
I picked up the scrap metal until the bag was full.
force the door open
Consumes 1 key, acquires 2 useful scrap metal
Acquire Lucy's curse skill 'Heavy Backpack' and acquire 2 pieces of usable scrap metal

RE_TimeVault.Name: safe of time
RE_TimeVault.Desc: Select 1 item and grant Preservation Function. If the party is annihilated, you can start with the items you saved in the next round. Enchantments or curses of equipment items are not maintained.
UseButtonTooltip: When annihilated, start with the item in the next round (Equipment's enchantment or curse is not maintained)
RE_TimeVault.EventDetails:
It is a safe with a mechanical feel that resembles a clock.
I think I could put something in the safe.
OrderStrings:
The item has been safely preserved.
When the function is finished, the safe is closed and can no longer be opened.

RE_Souvenirshop.Name: souvenir shop
RE_Souvenirshop.Desc: You can pay 600 gold to purchase the presented active item.
RE_Souvenirshop.EventDetails: Inside the store, a strange-looking clown greets customers. The stand shows the prepared items and starts the business. "Welcome. How about something like this?"
OrderStrings: The clown pondered for a moment, then pulled out another object and showed it. "Then how about this page?"
"Thank you for purchasing. Whoops..." The clown smiled contentedly, took the gold and disappeared.

RE_Casinoroulette.Name: casino roulette
RE_Casinoroulette.Desc: Pay 300 gold and spin roulette to get the winning item.
RE_Casinoroulette.EventDetails: It is a casino building covered in dazzling neon signs. The laughter of clowns can be heard from inside. "Put money and eat money! Why don't you try to make a fortune?"
OrderStrings:
As the roulette closes, the laughter disappears, and a creepy stillness arrives.
The door no longer opens.

RE_MagicShow.Name: magic theater
RE_MagicShow.Desc: Select an artifact and turn it into another helpful item.
RE_MagicShow.EventDetails: Inside the theater, a magician clown is preparing a magic trick. "Welcome to the magic show! Show me the artifact, and I'll show you some amazing magic."
OrderStrings: "Wow, my God! The Artifact turned into something you were looking for in an instant. Whoops... " The magician handed the reversed item and disappeared somewhere with black smoke...

RE_BloodFestival.Name: blood lottery
RE_BloodFestival.Desc: Consumes 1 key or has a 50% chance to acquire Lucy's Curse skill and select one of 3 Artifacts to acquire it.
UseButtonTooltip: Consumes 1 key, acquires 1 of 3 artifacts
Acquire one of 3 artifacts, 50% chance to acquire Lucy Curse skill
RE_BloodFestival.EventDetails: A lottery place for clowns where you can get prizes through a lottery. As you get closer, the soliciting clown reveals an unpleasant smile. "Heh, do you want to run a lottery? Then give me a ticket. what is a ticket? A long, hard stick. Something that can open anything."
OrderStrings:
I obtained the artifact that came out as a gift.
There doesn't seem to be anything to see here anymore.

"Hey! What are you doing!?" I was caught by a clown while trying to get a free gift without a ticket. She managed to get the prize and barely managed to escape, but somehow things seem to have gotten worse...

RE_BlackMarket.Name: black market
RE_BlackMarket.Desc: By paying a soul stone, you can purchase rare skills or enhance skills for investigators or Lucy.
UseButton: Check and purchase rare skills of the investigator (3 soul stones)
Check and purchase Lucy's rare skill (3 soul stones)
UseButtonTooltip: Soulstone is not consumed even if you check the skill
Soulstone is not consumed even if you check the skill
RE_BlackMarket.EventDetails: It is a mysterious black market that is operated by occupying an abandoned bunker. As I stand in front of the door, the surveillance camera moves, and someone's voice is heard from the speaker. "What's wrong with a kid like you? … Well, as long as you have the soul stone, it doesn't matter. Take a look around."
OrderStrings: "Okay. I'm sure you got the money." The unknown merchant smiled contentedly, took her soul stone, and paid for her purchase. She knocked on the iron door again, but there was no sound. ...

RE_GarbageDump.Name: garbage dump
RE_GarbageDump.Desc: Get 1 random unique grade gear and get 1 Lucy Curse Skill, or a random scroll > Get 3
UseButtonTooltip: Random <color=#F53172FF>Unique grade</color> equipment acquired, Lucy curse skill 'Banana Peel' acquired
Get 3 random scrolls
RE_GarbageDump.EventDetails:
It is a facility that collects and disposes of all the garbage in Blood Park.
Just being nearby makes me nauseous, but maybe I can find something useful.
OrderStrings: As a result of enduring the disgust and rummaging through the garbage heap, he was able to obtain useful equipment. But even if I wash it for a while, this stench doesn't seem to go away...
I don't really have the courage to find the garbage heap myself. Instead, after searching for a relatively clean looking scrap of paper nearby, I was able to get a few scrolls that were still usable.

RE_Devilsbeacon.Name: devil's beacon
RE_Devilsbeacon.Desc: <color=#1681F3FF>Rare</color> or higher equipment is cursed, and you get 2 skillbooks or 1 key.
UseButtonTooltip: <color=#1681F3FF>Rare level</color> or higher Cursed equipment and acquire 2 skill books
Curse one piece of equipment with <color=#1681F3FF>Rare level</color> or higher and obtain a key
RE_Devilsbeacon.EventDetails:
It is a beacon with an ominous flame burning.
You can feel the powerful curse energy just by getting close.
I think I could do something by heating the equipment in flames.
OrderStrings:
As soon as the equipment is put into the beacon, the flame reacts strongly and erodes the equipment.
The energy of the curse permeated the equipment, and he obtained the items stored in the place where the flames were burning.

RE_ParosLibrary.Name: Paros Vault
RE_ParosLibrary.Desc: Check 4 random common skills that have been strengthened for each character, and choose one of them to learn
UseButtonTooltip: Check and select skills to learn.
RE_ParosLibrary.EventDetails:
A huge library owned by the Church of Paros. It seems that the followers of the headmaster come and go every day to study the doctrine.
Old forbidden books that are not handled by the public are stored on the bookshelf.
Perhaps you will be able to read rare books that you cannot even look at in ordinary places.
OrderStrings:
Reading the forbidden book, I was able to remember a powerful skill.
Before being caught by the librarians, I decided to quickly escape from the library.

RE_Cathedraloflight.Name: cathedral of light
RE_Cathedraloflight.Desc: You can check 3 rare Lucy skills and select 1 of them to learn. After that, delete one of the Lucy Rare Skills you have.
UseButton: open the door and go in
UseButtonTooltip: Learn Lucy's Rare Skill, and forget one Lucy's Rare Skill
RE_Cathedraloflight.EventDetails:
A building that radiates divine light.
At first glance, it looks like a cathedral, but the mass of light is only in the form of a cross.
From the inside of the door, you can feel the power of light so powerful that it is creepy.
OrderStrings:
The moment I stepped into the cathedral, the remnants of light pierced my body in an instant.
I realized something flashing, but at the same time I felt like I was missing something.
It seemed like he would go blind beyond that, so he decided to get out of the church quickly.

RE_ReaperStatue.Name: Frozen Reaper
RE_ReaperStatue.Desc:
You can check and learn the random rare skill of each investigator. After that, select 1 rare skill of another investigator and replace it with the sacrificed knowledge.
(However, if the investigator who learned the skill already possesses the rare skill, the existing rare skill of the investigator will be replaced with the sacrificed knowledge.)
UseButtonTooltip:
Check and learn the random rare skill of each investigator. After that, select 1 rare skill of another investigator and replace it with the sacrificed knowledge.
If the investigator who learned the skill already possesses the rare skill, the existing rare skill of the investigator will be replaced with the sacrificed knowledge.
RE_ReaperStatue.EventDetails:
A huge stone statue made in the shape of a Shinigami.
It is frozen solid in the cold weather, and it emits a chilly air.
It seems that you will be able to obtain new strength by praying here.
OrderStrings:
When the prayer is over, the laughter of a Shinigami is heard from somewhere.
I have gained a lot of power, but I feel like something is irreversible.

RE_Holygrail.Name: Holy Grail of Curse
RE_Holygrail.Desc:
<color=#F53172FF>Unique grade</color> You can put cursed equipment below and choose one of the following.
(You can remove the curse and give <color=#F9D62FFF>Rare Enchant</color>, or you can convert the item you put into a random equipment item of a higher grade.)
UseButtonTooltip:
Requires Cursed Equipment of <color=#F53172FF>Unique Grade</color> or lower
Removes the curse and gives <color=#F9D62FFF>Rare Enchant</color>

Requires Cursed Equipment of <color=#F53172FF>Unique Grade</color> or lower
Converted to a higher tier item
RE_Holygrail.EventDetails:
A large chalice filled with holy water that shines brightly.
It seems to be possible to use holy water to purify the curse of equipment and to enchant it.
OrderStrings:
The curse of the equipment was washed away, and the magic of the Holy Grail began to flow instead.
The holy water containing the curse was polluted and turned into black tar.

RE_StarPillar.Name: star pillar
RE_StarPillar.Desc:
Acquire items across three floors.
Each floor demands wealth or luck.
Celestial can be obtained from the top floor.
RE_StarPillar.EventDetails:
[The lower part of the Star Pillar]
The entrance to the tower so high that the top is covered with clouds. You can get potions as loot.
To go up, you have no choice but to use the dark stairs or to use the elevator at your expense. how will we do it?
OrderStrings: use the stairs
33% chance to lose 1 random potion you have.
Use the elevator (250 gold)
Pay Gold and Climb Safely
use the stairs
33% chance to curse all equipment items.
Use the elevator (350 gold)
Pay Gold and Climb Safely
use the stairs
33% chance to get Lucy Curse Skill Cursed Clock.
Use the elevator (450 gold)
Pay Gold and Climb Safely

[Star Pillar Middle Layer]
It seems to have reached exactly the middle floor of the tower.
As loot, you can get items that will help you in battle.
In order to move up, you have no choice but to use the stairs you don't know what might be there, or to use the elevator at the expense of your possessions.
how will we do it?

[Upper part of the Star Pillar]
I climbed up to the top of the tower.
It looks like you can get a rare treasure, Celestial, from the top.
Not long to go to the top. A cramped staircase or an elevator, which one to use?

Finally got to the top of the tower.
The sky is so close here, it's as if you could reach the stars if you stretched out your hand.
He obtained the Celestial prepared at the top of the tower and returned safely to the ground through the portal.

While going up the stairs, I made a mistake and almost fell.
He barely fell, but it looks like a potion has been thrown out of his bag...

A curse trap was installed on the stairs.
The trap was triggered without even knowing how to escape, and all of the equipment he had was cursed...

A fascinating clock is placed in the middle of the stairs.
For some reason, I feel like I have to take this watch with me.
As if possessed by something, I picked up the watch and put it in my arms.
next
